document.full_text: a man posing as a government official took over a rural high school, where he beat students with a cane and leather belts and arbitrarily changed school hours, the police said friday.
document.title: the americas: guyana: telling tales in school
lines_and_colors: a man posing as a government official took over a rural high school, where he beat students with a cane and leather belts and arbitrarily changed school hours, the police said friday.
